VCardParser Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Auxiliary/VCard.hpp>


Public Member Functions

UINT32 ReadVCard (const CHAR *vcard_buffer, const UINT32 vcard_buffer_len, VCard *vcard)

Detailed Description

VCardParser parses a buffer which contains a vCard.

Shouldn't be used directly. Use the ReadBuffer() function of the VCard class instead.

Member Function Documentation

UINT32 VCardParser::ReadVCard (  const CHAR *  vcard_buffer,
const UINT32  vcard_buffer_len,
VCard *  vcard
) 
 

ReadVCard reads a byte buffer, which contains a vCard, and sets the values of the VCard object according to the values in the vcard_buffer. According to conversion and memory requirements not all of the items of the vcard_buffer are set in the vCard, only those items which shall be stored in vCard. E.g. binary data of PHOTO is dropped and not stored in the vCard.

Parameters:
vcard_buffer the byte buffer containing the vCard
vcard_buffer_len the length of the byte buffer
vCard the vCard which shall be filled with the values contained in the byte buffer
Returns:
number of bytes read, (UINT32) -1 on error
